duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect, maintain, and repair all plant mobile equipment in a professional and safe manner.
Diagnose equipment malfunctions and perform repair work on gas and diesel-powered vehicle engines, pumps, and compressors.
Perform repairs and overhauls on brake, clutch, hydraulic, A/C – heat, transmission, and other related systems on mobile equipment.
Perform tune-ups, burning, torch cutting, brazing, and arc welding on mobile equipment.
Change oil, lubricate, and maintain fluid levels on all mobile equipment in quarry and plant as required.
Maintain repair shop and submit daily logs showing jobs worked on, time spent, and materials used.
Exchange information with Quarry Supervisor regarding current operating conditions.
Perform housekeeping duties, and other work assigned by Quarry Supervisor.

education_certification.credential: Certification as a Diesel Mechanic from an accredited school
